newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Jingwei says acquisition talks continuing.
newsitem.headline: Jingwei says acquisition talks continuing.

text.p: Jingwei Textile Machinery Co Ltd said on Thursday it was still in talks relating to the possible acquistion of certain companies from its controlling shareholder and independent third parties.
"The negotiations in relation to the acquistion are still in progress," the company said in a statement.
Last month, the Chinese textile machinery maker said its acquisition criteria were that the target is of a meaningful size and high quality with growth potential.
Jingwei shares were up HK$0.107 at HK$1.81 at midday on Thursday.
It has an H-share listing in Hong Kong and a local-currency A-share listing in Shenzhen.
